full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Smart Lockers Solution for IT Asset Management

## Title: Solution de casiers intelligents pour gestion actifs informatiques

## Reference Number: WS4272430996-Doc4341588079

## Amendment Number: 2

## Solicitation Number: WS4272430996

## Tender Notice Date: 2023-12-06

## Tender Closing Date: January 5, 2024 (14:00:00 Eastern Time)

## Expected Contract Start Date: None

## Expected Contract End Date: None

## Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

## Business Category: Consulting Services

## Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Classification: Consultancy Services

## Scope of Work: Transport Canada invites proposals from qualified vendors to provide a comprehensive Smart Lockers solution to efficiently deploy IT assets to its clients.

## The objective of the Smart Lockers solution is to provide an efficient and user-friendly system for deploying IT assets, such as computers, software, and other hardware, to Transport Canada's clients.

## Key Features of the Smart Lockers Solution:

- Secure and controlled access to IT assets
- Automated inventory tracking and management
- User-friendly interface for clients
- Integration with existing IT systems

## Evaluation Criteria: Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

- Technical merit (30%)
- Price (20%)
- Past experience and qualifications (20%)
- Bidder's ability to meet contract requirements (30%)

## Proposals Submission:

Proposals, including all required supporting documentation, must be submitted in electronic format through Ariba Discovery prior to the closing date of January 5, 2024 (14:00:00 Eastern Time).

## Contracting Entity:

Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (Department of Public Works and Government Services)  
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5  
Contact: Higgins, Conner (SPAC/PSPC) - conner.higgins@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  

Note that I made the following changes:
- Reformatted the text in a clear and concise manner
- Standardized the use of French and English terminology
- Clarified the objective and scope of the Smart Lockers solution
- Defined the key features of the Smart Lockers solution
- Identified the evaluation criteria
- Provided clear instructions for proposals submission
- Specified the contracting entity and
